SELECT b.ORGNZT_NM, a.ESNTL_ID, a.USER_NM, a.EMPL_NO, a.OFCPS_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND binary(IFNULL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ')) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND binary(IFNULL(a.USER_NM, ' ')) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
ORDER BY b.ORGNZT_NM, a.USER_NM ASC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(EMPLYR_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND binary(IFNULL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ')) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND binary(IFNULL(a.USER_NM, ' ')) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
SELECT OFCPS_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = #{wrterId}

SELECT A.REPRT_ID, C.CODE_NM REPRT_SE, A.REPRT_SJ, A.REPORT_DE, B.USER_NM WRTER_NM, A.REPORT_BGNDE, A.REPORT_ENDDE, (CASE WHEN A.CONFM_DT = '' THEN '미승인' ELSE '승인' END) CONFM_DT FROM COMTNWIKMNTHNGREPRT A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.WRTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C ON C.CODE_ID = 'COM060' AND A.REPRT_SE = C.CODE WHERE (A.WRTER_ID = #{searchId} || A.REPORTR_ID = #{searchId})
AND A.REPORT_DE BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe}
AND (A.REPORT_BGNDE BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe} || A.REPORT_ENDDE BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe} )
AND binary(A.REPRT_SJ) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND binary(B.USER_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND A.CONFM_DT = ''
AND A.CONFM_DT != ''
AND A.REPRT_SE = '1'
AND A.REPRT_SE = '2'
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(A.REPRT_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNWIKMNTHNGREPRT A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.WRTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID WHERE (A.WRTER_ID = #{searchId} || A.REPORTR_ID = #{searchId})
AND A.REPORT_DE BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe}
AND (A.REPORT_BGNDE BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe} || A.REPORT_ENDDE BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe} )
AND binary(A.REPRT_SJ) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND binary(B.USER_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND A.CONFM_DT = ''
AND A.CONFM_DT != ''
AND A.REPRT_SE = '1'
AND A.REPRT_SE = '2'

SELECT A.REPRT_ID, A.REPRT_SE, A.REPRT_SJ, A.REPORT_DE, A.WRTER_ID, B.USER_NM WRTER_NM, B.OFCPS_NM WRTER_CLSF_NM, A.REPORTR_ID, C.USER_NM REPORTR_NM, C.OFCPS_NM REPORTR_CLSF_NM, A.REPORT_BGNDE, A.REPORT_ENDDE, A.THSWIK_REPORT_CN, A.NEXTWIK_REPORT_CN, A.PARTCLR_MATTER, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, A.CONFM_DT, DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d%H%i%S') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d%H%i%S') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNWIKMNTHNGREPRT A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.WRTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO C ON A.REPORTR_ID = C.ESNTL_ID WHERE A.REPRT_ID = #{reprtId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNWIKMNTHNGREPRT SET REPRT_SE=#{reprtSe}, REPRT_SJ=#{reprtSj}, REPORT_DE=#{reprtDe}, WRTER_ID=#{wrterId}, REPORTR_ID=#{reportrId}, REPORT_BGNDE=#{reprtBgnDe}, REPORT_ENDDE=#{reprtEndDe}, THSWIK_REPORT_CN=#{reprtThswikCn}, NEXTWIK_REPORT_CN=#{reprtLesseeCn}, PARTCLR_MATTER=#{partclrMatter}, ATCH_FILE_ID=#{atchFileId}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE REPRT_ID = #{reprtId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNWIKMNTHNGREPRT ( REPRT_ID, REPRT_SE, REPRT_SJ, REPORT_DE, WRTER_ID, REPORTR_ID, REPORT_BGNDE, REPORT_ENDDE, THSWIK_REPORT_CN, NEXTWIK_REPORT_CN, PARTCLR_MATTER, ATCH_FILE_ID, CONFM_DT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #{reprtId}, #{reprtSe}, #{reprtSj}, #{reprtDe}, #{wrterId}, #{reportrId}, #{reprtBgnDe}, #{reprtEndDe}, #{reprtThswikCn}, #{reprtLesseeCn}, #{partclrMatter}, #{atchFileId}, '', sysdate(), #{frstRegisterId}, sysdate(), #{lastUpdusrId} )
